resources.string:
Coju Dialer is an integrated dialer app that saves you time and stress with its powerful dialing, viewing, export/import and sharing capabilities. There is no dialer app like Coju Dialer and it is a must have for every Android phone or tablet.


This dialer also comes with the handy features of single tap dialing and single tap Google search of any number.


The dialer app allows you to view call logs by different types including duration and location. It can display 100, 500 or all stored call logs at any time. The app also has powerful filter capabilities which allow you to see calls logs from specific location or duration.
